not_authorized: You are not authorized to access this API
service_error: Welcome to RunTailor {service_name}. Looks like there's a problem with database connection. Pls check it out once.
no_user_with_mobile: There is no user with this mobile number!
went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again
mobile_already_in_use: This mobile number is already in use!
label_already_in_use: This label is already in use!
code_already_in_use: This code is already in use!
too_many_requests: We received too many requests from you. Please try again later.
deactivated_account: Looks like your account is deactivated. Please contact our support team.
signed_out: You have been successfully signed out.
